alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:04PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 730 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iowa, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Iowa, Hayes, Lebleu Settlement, Holmwood, and Bell City. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 36 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
